name: Open Source Index Fund
description: Create your own index fund on Coinbase Pro that replicates Coinbase's Index Fund.

COINBASE_FIAT_CURRENCY.description: The fiat currency you want to use for your trades.

APP_ID.description: The application id for server app.

SERVER_URL.description: The full url for the server api.

MASTER_KEY.description: The master key for accessing the server api. Change this!

DATABASE_URI.description: The url to the server's database.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of web workers you want running concurrently.

USE_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORDS.description: Whether to store admin dashboard passwords in plain text or encrypted.

TRUST_PROXY.description: Whether or not to trust the proxy server. On Heroku you can.
